title: [拍本] 音乐 - My Boyfriend ls Gay
author: 我叫坂本
txt_content:
My Boyfriend ls Gay然而我又带来音乐系列了233
这首歌挺好听的，雾
非常好听啊-xD
音乐+翻译
http://www.xiami.com/widget/272172232_1771893716,_235_346_5695c1_457cb4_1/multiPlayer.swf
It happened on a Monday 
这件事发生在星期一 
It was my baby's birthday 
这是我宝贝的生日 
I wanted to surprise him he deserved a treat 
我想给他一个惊喜因为他值得我这么做 
He said he'd be late working 
他说他会工作到很迟 
He'd call me when he's leaving 
当他要离开时，他会打电话给我 
Off I went to get him something 
我动身去给他买礼物 
Ain't I just too sweet 
我这样是不是很贴心？ 
@570855441 @Lelouch_Lamper @volta薯片~
